exceptions.exn: In environment a : bool l : lb Unable to unify "lb_succ a l" with "(fix lb_plus (a : bool) (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => lb_succ a m | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => lb_succ a l | y :: m0 => let (r, z) := bin_add a x y in z :: lb_plus r l0 m0 end end) a l nil".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
a: bool
l: lb

Goal:
lb_plus a l nil = lb_succ a l

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
lb_succ = fix lb_succ (a : bool) (l : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => a :: nil | x :: l0 => let (r, z) := bin_add ⟘ a x in z :: lb_succ r l0 end : bool -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_succ _%bool_scope _%list_scope
Notation lb := (list bool)
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
lb_plus = fix lb_plus (a : bool) (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => lb_succ a m | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => lb_succ a l | y :: m0 => let (r, z) := bin_add a x y in z :: lb_plus r l0 m0 end end : bool -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_plus _%bool_scope (_ _)%list_scope
lb_plus_fix_0 : forall (a : bool) (l : lb), lb_plus a nil l = lb_succ a l
lb_succ_spec : forall (a : bool) (l : lb), ⟦ lb_succ a l ⟧ = bool2nat a + ⟦ l ⟧
lb_join_nil_eq : forall a b : lb, a ↑ b ≂ nil -> a ≂ nil /\ b ≂ nil
lb_minus : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\ b ≂ a ↑ c}
lb_ortho_mask_nil : forall a x : lb, a ⟂ x -> x ⪯ a -> x ≂ nil
lb_complement : forall a b : lb, {c : lb | b ⟂ c /\ a ↑ b ≂ c ↑ b}
lb_join_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↑ a ⪯ m ↑ b
lb_meet_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↓ a ⪯ m ↓ b
lb_mask_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ++ a ⪯ m ++ b
lb_mask_equiv_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> l ≂ m -> a ≂ b -> l ++ a ≂ m ++ b
lb_meet_idem : forall a : lb, a ↓ a = a
lb_join_idem : forall a : lb, a ↑ a = a
lb_succ_bot : forall l : lb, lb_succ ⟘ l ≂ l
lb_join_meet_idem : forall a b : lb, a ↑ a ↓ b ≂ a
lb_mask_meet : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b < -> a ↓ b ≂ a
lb_succ_spec_0 : forall l : lb, ⟦ lb_succ ⟘ l ⟧ = ⟦ l ⟧
lb_meet_dec_left : forall a b : lb, a ↓ b ⪯ a
lb_join_inc_left : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ a ↑ b
nat_lb_1 = eq_ind_r (fun l : lb => l = ⟙ :: nil) (eq_ind_r (fun l : lb => ⟙ :: l = ⟙ :: nil) eq_refl nat_lb_fix_0) (nat_lb_fix_2 0) : ⟬ 1 ⟭ = ⟙ :: nil
lb_meet_join_distr : forall a b c : lb, a ↓ (b ↑ c) ≂ a ↓ b ↑ a ↓ c
lb_ortho_join : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x ↑ y < -> a ⟂ x /\ a ⟂ y
lb_succ_spec_1 : forall l : lb, ⟦ lb_succ ⟙ l ⟧ = S ⟦ l ⟧
lb_pointwise = fun f : bool -> bool -> bool => fix lb_pointwise (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => match m with | nil => nil | _ :: _ => map (f ⟘) m end | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => map (fun x0 : bool => f x0 ⟘) l | y :: m0 => f x y :: lb_pointwise l0 m0 end end : (bool -> bool -> bool) -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_pointwise _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope
lb_ortho_sym : forall a b : lb, a ⟂ b -> b ⟂ a
lb_meet_join_idem : forall a b : lb, a ↓ (a ↑ b) ≂ a
lb_meet_app : forall l m a b : lb, length l = length m -> (l ++ a) ↓ (m ++ b) = l ↓ m ++ a ↓ b
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_join : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b < -> a ↑ b ≂ b
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_meet_assoc : forall a b c : lb, a ↓ (b ↓ c) ≂ a ↓ b ↓ c
lb_join_assoc : forall a b c : lb, a ↑ (b ↑ c) ≂ a ↑ b ↑ c
lb_ortho_anti_left : forall a b x : lb, a ⪯ b -> b ⟂ x -> a ⟂ x
lb_meet_length : forall a b : lb, length a = length b -> length (a ↓ b) = length a
lb_pointwise_mono_left : forall f : bool -> bool -> bool, (forall x a b : bool, a ⪦ b -> f x a ⪦ f x b) -> f ⟘ ⟘ = ⟘ -> forall l m k : lb, l ⪯ m -> lb_pointwise f k l ⪯ lb_pointwise f k m
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
lb_meet_spec : forall a b c : lb, c ⪯ a -> c ⪯ b -> c ⪯ a ↓ b
lb_ortho_anti : forall a b x y : lb, a ⪯ b -> x ⪯ y -> b ⟂ y -> a ⟂ x
lb_meet_dec_right : forall a b : lb, a ↓ b ⪯ b
lb_join_inc_right : forall a b : lb, b ⪯ a ↑ b
